_rawTooltip.fullTooltip:
INNATE: Periodically, Yuumi's next basic attack, which gains 50 bonus range, or ability hit against enemy champions will heal her for 25 − 110 (based on level) (+ 15% AP). If she is attached to an ally within 4 seconds, they are healed for the same amount.
INNATE: While attached to an ally, Yuumi grants them 2 permanent Friendship stacks for killing enemy champions and minions. The ally with the highest Friendship stacks becomes Yuumi's Best Friend, which empowers her abilities with additional effects while she is attached to them.

If cast while [[2]] Yuumi can control the missile using her mouse for a short period before it accelerates in the a straight line. The accelerated missile deals [[3]] and [[4]] the target for 55% for 2 seconds, instead.

[[5]] Prowling Projectile's Slow will always be enhanced and hitting an enemy champion also grants them [[6]] On-Hit for 5 seconds.

[[4]] Yuumi dashes to an ally champion and [[5]] to them. While Yuumi is [[6]], she follows her partner's movement and is Untargetable except from towers.

[[7]] effects on Yuumi place this Ablity on a 5 second Cooldown.

Yuumi [[0]] herself blocking [[1]] and gains [[2]] for 3 seconds. While the shield persists, the target also gains [[3]].

If yuumi is [[4]], this Ability affects her ally instead and also restores 20/24/28/32/36 Mana to them, increased by up to 100% based on their missing Mana.

Yuumi channels for 3.5 seconds, launching 5 magical waves affecting both teams. If intitially cast while [[0]], Yuumi can steer the waves to follow her mouse.

Enemies struck are dealt [[1]] and [[2]] by 10% for 1.25 seconds. increased by 10% per wave hit.

Ally champions are healed for [[3]] per wave. Excess healing is converted to a [[4]] instead.

Immobilizing Yuumi places this ability on a 5 second cooldown

Change.After: Yuumi increases her ally's adaptive force by 12/14/16/18/20 (+12/14/16/18/20% of her attached ally's adaptive force) (Yuumi grants herself the same amount)

Change.After: Grants 25/30/35/40/45% attack speed to herself or the Anchored target
No longer increases Yuumi's healing based on the target's missing health

Change.After: When Bop ‘n’ Block is ready Yuumi will gain 25 bonus range for that attack only.

When Yuumi's spells or attacks affect champions, she heals herself and charges a heal for her allies. If she attaches within the next 4 seconds, she brings the heal to her ally as well. While attached, this effect automatically occurs.

While attached, Yuumi builds Friendship whenever her Ally kills enemy champions and minions. Each ally has their own unique Friendship score. While attached to her Best Friend, Yuumi’s abilities gain bonus effects.
While Yuumi’s passive is ready her auto attack range is increased by 50

Yuumi fires a missile that slows the first enemy hit. If cast while attached, Yuumi can control the missile for a short period before it becomes empowered, greatly accelerating and slowing enemies by an increased amount.

This ability’s slow will always be empowered and hitting enemy champions also grants 10/12/14/16/18/20 (+10% AP) on-hit damage to her ally for 5 seconds. This damage is increased by up to 75% based on her ally's Critical Strike Chance.
Hitting an enemy with Yuumi’s Q now reveals them. (Note: this will not reveal stealthed enemies.)
Yuumi and her attached ally will no longer receive adaptive force bonus stats
Yuumi’s W no longer counts as a “Positive Boon” for Summon Aery
Yuumi gains an additional 10-20% heal and shield power (based on Ally level) and her Best Friend gains 3/5/7/9/11 (+4% AP) on-hit healing. This is affected by Yuumi's heal and shield power.
Now shields allies instead of healing
Allies receive a 20% movement speed bonus while Yuumi’s E shield persists (until shield is broken or decays after 3 seconds)
Yuumi restores 20/24/28/32/36 Mana to her Anchor (not herself), increased by up to 100% based on their missing Mana (30% to 80% missing mana).
E - Zoomies! does not have a Best Friend bonus because Yuumi should be able to save all her allies

For 3.5 seconds, Yuumi fires 5 magical waves that affect enemies and allies. If cast while attached, Yuumi can steer the waves to follow her mouse. For ally champions, the waves heal. The heal is increased by 130% on her Best Friend. All excess healing is converted to a shield, lasting 3 seconds after the ability ends. For all enemies, the waves deal damage and apply a stacking slow.
10% + 10% additive per wave hit (maximum of 50% slow)
Waves also grant Yuumi's Best Friend 20/40/60 (+10% AP) Armor and Magic Resistance for the duration of the spell.
1.5 seconds (Note: the shield will last the full duration of the spell (3.5 seconds) plus this amount of time)
Change.parsedAfter: 1.5 seconds (Note: the shield will last the full duration of the spell (3.5 seconds) plus this amount of time)

Change.parsedAfter: 5/7.5/10/12.5/15% (based on spell rank)
